verses.verse: And He <S%G1525>entered<s%> and was <S%G1330>passing<s%> <S%G1330>through<s%> <S%G2410>Jericho.<s%>
And <S%G2400>behold,<s%> there was a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> by the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2195>Zaccheus;<s%> and he was a <S%G754>chief<s%> tax-gatherer, and he was <S%G4145>rich.<s%>

And he was <S%G2212>trying<s%> to <S%G3708>see<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was, and he was <S%G3756>unable<s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G575>because<s%> of the <S%G3793>crowd,<s%> for he was <S%G3398>small<s%> in <S%G2244>stature.<s%>

And he <S%G4390>ran<s%> on <S%G1715>ahead<s%> and <S%G305>climbed<s%> up into a <S%G4809>sycamore<s%> <S%G4809>tree<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> to <S%G3708>see<s%> Him, for He was <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G1330>pass<s%> <S%G1330>through<s%> that way.

And <S%G5613>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> to the <S%G5117>place,<s%> He <S%G308>looked<s%> up and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G2195>"Zaccheus,<s%> <S%G4692>hurry<s%> and <S%G2597>come<s%> <S%G2597>down,<s%> for <S%G4594>today<s%> I <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G3306>stay<s%> at your <S%G3624>house.<s%>"
And he <S%G4692>hurried<s%> and <S%G2597>came<s%> <S%G2597>down,<s%> and <S%G5264>received<s%> Him <S%G5463>gladly.<s%>

And when they <S%G3708>saw<s%> it, they <S%G3956>all<s%> [began] to <S%G1234>grumble,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "He has <S%G1525>gone<s%> to be the <S%G2647>guest<s%> of a <S%G435>man<s%> who is a <S%G268>sinner.<s%>"

And <S%G2195>Zaccheus<s%> <S%G2476>stopped<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2255>half<s%> of my <S%G5225>possessions<s%> I will <S%G1325>give<s%> to the <S%G4434>poor,<s%> and <S%G1487>if<s%> I have <S%G4811>defrauded<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> of <S%G5100>anything,<s%> I will <S%G591>give<s%> <S%G591>back<s%> <S%G5073>four<s%> <S%G5073>times<s%> as <S%G5073>much.<s%>"

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G4594>"Today<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> has <S%G1096>come<s%> to <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3624>house,<s%> <S%G2530>because<s%> he, <S%G2532>too,<s%> is a <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham.<s%>
"For the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> has <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G2212>seek<s%> and to <S%G4982>save<s%> that which was <S%G622>lost.<s%>"

And while they were <S%G191>listening<s%> to <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things,<s%> He <S%G4369>went<s%> on to <S%G3004>tell<s%> a <S%G3850>parable,<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> He was <S%G1451>near<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> and they <S%G1380>supposed<s%> that the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> was <S%G3195>going<s%> to <S%G398>appear<s%> <S%G3916>immediately.<s%>

He <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> "A <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2104>nobleman<s%> <S%G444><s%> <S%G4198>went<s%> to a <S%G3117>distant<s%> <S%G5561>country<s%> to <S%G2983>receive<s%> a <S%G932>kingdom<s%> for <S%G1438>himself,<s%> and [then] <S%G5290>return.<s%>

"And he <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> of his <S%G1401>slaves,<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> them <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G3414>minas,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G4231>'Do<s%> <S%G4231>business<s%> [with this] <S%G1722>until<s%> <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G2064>come<s%> [back.]'

"But his <S%G4177>citizens<s%> <S%G3404>hated<s%> him, and <S%G649>sent<s%> a <S%G4242>delegation<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> 'We do not <S%G2309>want<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> to <S%G936>reign<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> us.'

"And it <S%G1096>came<s%> about that <S%G1722>when<s%> he <S%G1880>returned,<s%> after <S%G2983>receiving<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom,<s%> he <S%G3004>ordered<s%> that <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G1401>slaves,<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> he had <S%G1325>given<s%> the <S%G694>money,<s%> be <S%G5455>called<s%> to him in <S%G2443>order<s%> that he might <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G1281>business<s%> they had <S%G1281>done.<s%>
"And the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G3854>appeared,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>'Master,<s%> your <S%G3414>mina<s%> has <S%G4333>made<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G3414>minas<s%> <S%G4333>more.<s%>'

"And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G1065>'Well<s%> <S%G2095><s%> <S%G2095>done,<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G1401>slave,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> you have <S%G1096>been<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%> in a <S%G1646>very<s%> <S%G1646>little<s%> <S%G1646>thing,<s%> be in <S%G1849>authority<s%> <S%G1883>over<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G4172>cities.<s%>'
"And the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> 'Your <S%G3414>mina,<s%> <S%G2962>master,<s%> has <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G3414>minas.<s%>'
"And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to him <S%G2532>also,<s%> 'And you are to be <S%G1883>over<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G4172>cities.<s%>'

"And <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>'Master,<s%> <S%G2400>behold<s%> your <S%G3414>mina,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2192>kept<s%> <S%G606>put<s%> <S%G606>away<s%> in a <S%G4676>handkerchief;<s%>

for I was <S%G5399>afraid<s%> of you, <S%G3754>because<s%> you are an <S%G840>exacting<s%> <S%G444>man;<s%> you <S%G142>take<s%> up <S%G3739>what<s%> you did not <S%G5087>lay<s%> <S%G5087>down,<s%> and <S%G2325>reap<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> you did not <S%G4687>sow.<s%>'

"He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, 'By your own <S%G4750>words<s%> I will <S%G2919>judge<s%> you, you <S%G4190>worthless<s%> <S%G1401>slave.<s%> Did you <S%G3609>know<s%> that I <S%G1510>am<s%> an <S%G840>exacting<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G142>taking<s%> up <S%G3739>what<s%> I did not <S%G5087>lay<s%> <S%G5087>down,<s%> and <S%G2325>reaping<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> I did not <S%G4687>sow<s%>?

<S%G2532>'Then<s%> <S%G1223>why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> did you not <S%G1325>put<s%> the <S%G694>money<s%> in the <S%G5132>bank,<s%> and having <S%G2064>come,<s%> I would have <S%G4238>collected<s%> it with <S%G5110>interest<s%>?'

"And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G3936>bystanders,<s%> <S%G142>'Take<s%> the <S%G3414>mina<s%> <S%G142>away<s%> from him, and <S%G1325>give<s%> it to the one who <S%G2192>has<s%> the <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G3414>minas.<s%>'
"And they <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G2962>'Master,<s%> he <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G3414>minas<s%> [already.]'

"I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you, that to <S%G3956>everyone<s%> who <S%G2192>has<s%> shall [more] be <S%G1325>given,<s%> but from the one who does not <S%G2192>have,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> he does <S%G2192>have<s%> shall be <S%G142>taken<s%> <S%G142>away.<s%>

"But <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G2190>enemies<s%> of <S%G1473>mine,<s%> who did not <S%G2309>want<s%> me to <S%G936>reign<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> them, <S%G71>bring<s%> them <S%G5602>here<s%> and <S%G2695>slay<s%> them in my <S%G1715>presence.<s%>"
And after He had <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things,<s%> He was <S%G4198>going<s%> on <S%G1715>ahead,<s%> <S%G305>ascending<s%> to <S%G2414>Jerusalem.<s%>

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> about that <S%G5613>when<s%> He <S%G1448>approached<s%> <S%G967>Bethphage<s%> and <S%G963>Bethany,<s%> <S%G4314>near<s%> the <S%G3735>mount<s%> that is <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G1638>Olivet,<s%> He <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> of the <S%G3101>disciples,<s%>

<S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5217>"Go<s%> into the <S%G2968>village<s%> <S%G2713>opposite<s%> [you,] in <S%G3739>which<s%> as you <S%G1531>enter<s%> you will <S%G2147>find<s%> a <S%G4454>colt<s%> <S%G1210>tied,<s%> on <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G444>one<s%> <S%G3762><s%> <S%G4455>yet<s%> has <S%G4455>ever<s%> <S%G2523>sat;<s%> <S%G3089>untie<s%> it, and <S%G71>bring<s%> it [here.]

"And <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G2065>asks<s%> you, <S%G1223>'Why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> are you <S%G3089>untying<s%> it?' <S%G3779>thus<s%> shall you <S%G3004>speak,<s%> 'The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> of it.'"
And <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> and <S%G2147>found<s%> it <S%G2531>just<s%> as He had <S%G3004>told<s%> them.
And as they were <S%G3089>untying<s%> the <S%G4454>colt,<s%> its <S%G2962>owners<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>"Why<s%> are you <S%G3089>untying<s%> the <S%G4454>colt<s%>?"
And they <S%G3004>said,<s%> "The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> of it."
And they <S%G71>brought<s%> it to <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and they <S%G1977>threw<s%> their <S%G2440>garments<s%> on the <S%G4454>colt,<s%> and <S%G1913>put<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> [on it.]
And as He was <S%G4198>going,<s%> they were <S%G5291>spreading<s%> their <S%G2440>garments<s%> in the <S%G3598>road.<s%>

And as He was <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G1448>approaching,<s%> <S%G4314>near<s%> the <S%G2600>descent<s%> of the <S%G3735>Mount<s%> of <S%G1636>Olives,<s%> the <S%G537>whole<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G134>praise<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5463>joyfully<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> for <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1411>miracles<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they had <S%G3708>seen,<s%>

<S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2127>"Blessed<s%> is the <S%G935>King<s%> who <S%G2064>comes<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> <S%G1515>Peace<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven<s%> and <S%G1391>glory<s%> in the <S%G5310>highest!<s%>"
And <S%G5100>some<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> in the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> <S%G2008>rebuke<s%> Your <S%G3101>disciples.<s%>"

And He <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you, <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G4623>become<s%> <S%G4623>silent,<s%> the <S%G3037>stones<s%> will <S%G2896>cry<s%> out!"
And <S%G5613>when<s%> He <S%G1448>approached,<s%> He <S%G3708>saw<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> and <S%G2799>wept<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> it,

<S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1487>"If<s%> you had <S%G1097>known<s%> in <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> you, the things which make for <S%G1515>peace!<s%> But <S%G3568>now<s%> they have been <S%G2928>hidden<s%> from your <S%G3788>eyes.<s%>

"For the <S%G2250>days<s%> shall <S%G2240>come<s%> upon you <S%G2532>when<s%> your <S%G2190>enemies<s%> will <S%G3925>throw<s%> up a <S%G5482>bank<s%> before you, and <S%G4033>surround<s%> you, and <S%G4912>hem<s%> you in on <S%G3840>every<s%> <S%G3840>side,<s%>

and will <S%G1474>level<s%> you to the <S%G1474>ground<s%> and your <S%G5043>children<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> you, and they will not <S%G863>leave<s%> in you one <S%G3037>stone<s%> upon <S%G3037>another,<s%> <S%G473>because<s%> <S%G3739><s%> you did not <S%G1097>recognize<s%> the <S%G2540>time<s%> of your <S%G1984>visitation.<s%> "
And He <S%G1525>entered<s%> the <S%G2413>temple<s%> and <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G1544>cast<s%> out <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G4453>selling,<s%>

<S%G3004>saying<s%> to them, " It is <S%G1125>written,<s%> 'And My <S%G3624>house<s%> shall be a <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G4335>prayer,<s%>' but you have <S%G4160>made<s%> it a robbers' <S%G4693>den.<s%>"

And He was <S%G1321>teaching<s%> <S%G2596>daily<s%> <S%G2250><s%> in the <S%G2413>temple;<s%> but the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> and the <S%G4413>leading<s%> <S%G4413>men<s%> among the <S%G2992>people<s%> were <S%G2212>trying<s%> to <S%G622>destroy<s%> Him,
and they could not <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G5101>anything<s%> that they might <S%G4160>do,<s%> for <S%G537>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> were <S%G1582>hanging<s%> upon His <S%G191>words.<s%>
